players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm clean. Alice check anyone else."
Diana: "Checking Bob. Trustworthy to start."
You: "Will check Diana next. Bob is mafia."
Diana: "Checking Alice. Doubtful her claim."
Bob: "I acted alone last night. Check Diana."
You: "Will check Charlie next. Trust Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm clean. Alice check anyone else."
Diana: "Checking Bob. Trustworthy to start."
Alice: "Will check Diana next. Bob is mafia."
Diana: "Checking Alice. Doubtful her claim."
You: "I acted alone last night. Check Diana."
Alice: "Will check Charlie next. Trust Bob."
